body_html:
Yep that seems more Pythonic but has the right level of flexibility 👍

Now this can be added into nn.Module directly so it can be used with convolutions, RNNs, everything. Loop over the keys and throw an error if the module doesn't contain it.
body_text:
Yep that seems more Pythonic but has the right level of flexibility 👍
Now this can be added into nn.Module directly so it can be used with convolutions, RNNs, everything. Loop over the keys and throw an error if the module doesn't contain it.
body:
Yep that seems more Pythonic but has the right level of flexibility 👍

Now this can be added into [`nn.Module`](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/module.py) directly so it can be used with convolutions, RNNs, everything. Loop over the keys and throw an error if the module doesn't contain it.
